Title: Perfect product!
Review: Good product, don't be carried away by some bad reviews, this is a gaming laptop so don't expect a very good battery and even if it had one the battery consumption would be high due to graphic card. The graphic card performance is decent (Value for money tho) you get around 50-60 fps in warzone (ultra settings + dlss (ultra) ) and around 55-65 in PUBG basically it can run all tripe A title games in playable fps but don't try ray tracing tho.
